page.title: 03The Hunthouse Restaurant
page.content: The Hunt House is owned by Jan Geggie. The Hunt House got its name from the hunting lodge. The house was built in 1656. On average they have 25 people a night. On Saturdays they have 35. The Hunt House is only open at night from Tuesday to Saturday. It opens from 7-15 till 10-30. They change the menu every month. You have the choice of four dinners and desserts. The food is mostly French. they have been there for nine years. It took a lot of money to do the buildings up. They dug out a wall and found an old fireplace. They also found an old back door. The windows were made of stone Mulleow. It costs approximately Â£12 for the set four course meal. The lady was very kind to us. It was a very interesting house.
